Apache Continuum 1.3.7 Release Notes
The Apache Continuum team is pleased to announce Apache Continuum 1.3.7.
To learn more about how the Continuum dev team versions releases, see our release guidelines.
Release Notes - Continuum - Version 1.3.7
Bug
[CONTINUUM-2003] - Edit roles deletes all existing roles when sharing a user database
[CONTINUUM-2603] - CSRF vulnerability - Continuum doesn't check which form sends credentials
[CONTINUUM-2604] - extremecomponents table should use autoIncludeParameters="false"
Task
[CONTINUUM-2605] - upgrade to Redback 1.2.6
Have Fun !
--
The Apache Continuum Team
